text: Anthony Murray Gleeson (born 30 August 1938) is an Australian former judge. He was the 11th Chief Justice of Australia, in office from 1998 to 2008. On 7 November 2008, Gleeson was appointed a non-permanent judge of the Court of Final Appeal of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Chief justices of Australia Category:Australian lawyers Category:Politicians from New South Wales
title: Murray Gleeson
